description.title: React
description.desc: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
description.other: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes

description.title: Nextjs®
description.desc: As an asynchronous event-driven JavaScript runtime
description.other: Next.js gives you the best developer experience with all the features you need for production: hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling, route pre-fetching, and more. No config needed.
